enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve checking or retrieving attributes from elements, requiring similar setup with elements having attributes.
Both methods take an attribute key as input and operate on a collection of elements, suggesting similar test setup involving elements with attributes.
The output of 'attr' can be informed by the presence check in 'hasAttr', allowing assertions to verify both attribute presence and value.
The list of attribute values returned by 'eachAttr' can be used to construct assertions for 'attr' by verifying individual attribute values.
